Name: Parkour Polygon
About the game: Run, jump, and scale the city walls! Parkour Polygon is a throwback platformer inspired by classics like Super Meat Boy and the Super Mario series. Set against the striking neon moonlight, you must navigate the rooftops of a sci-fi city to reach your destination, dodging hazards as you go. Features: -Leap from building to building in a fast-paced platforming rush! -Use the environment; jump off of signs in the background to reach new distances! -Over 20 levels tuned to test your platforming prowess. -A stunning synthwave soundtrack by James 'Nihilore' Opie -Test your skill and endurance in Endless Mode; see how far you can go...with just one life!
Meta Title: Parkour Polygon: Sep 21, 2018, Jonah Gasson and Full Over...
